entry.string: The Ping Module will automatically ping sites to let them know that your Xaraya Website has been updated with content. Currently, the ping module only supports the articles module via a create and update hook.
entry.translation: Zee Peeng Mudoole-a veell ootumeteecelly peeng seetes tu let zeem knoo thet yuoor Xereya Vebseete-a hes beee updeted veet cuntent. Um de hur de hur de hur. Coorrently, zee peeng mudoole-a oonly sooppurts zee erteecles mudoole-a feea a creete-a und updete-a huuk.

entry.string: Simply hook the articles module with the ping module and the rest is done behind the scenes. The Ping Module will use the specific publication type that the content is assigned to, therefore you may want to register the individual publication types that you want to notify.
entry.translation: Seemply huuk zee erteecles mudoole-a veet zee peeng mudoole-a und zee rest is dune-a beheend zee scenes. Zee Peeng Mudoole-a veell use-a zee speceeffic poobleeceshun type-a thet zee cuntent is esseegned tu, zeereffure-a yuoo mey vunt tu regeester zee indeefidooel poobleeceshun types thet yuoo vunt tu nuteeffy. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: The Ping Module has no blocks included at this time.
entry.translation: Zee Peeng Mudoole-a hes nu blucks inclooded et thees teeme-a.

entry.string: Create will ping weblogs.com on creation of an article, update will ping when an article has been updated.
entry.translation: Creete-a veell peeng weblogs.com oon creeshun ooff un erteecle-a, updete-a veell peeng vhee un erteecle-a hes beee updeted. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: Extended information about this module can be found here. [modules module]
entry.translation: Extended inffurmeshun ebuoot thees mudoole-a cun be-a fuoond here-a. [mudooles mudoole-a]
